title: Got to silver... but that means nothing for 2015 yeah?
body: As the title says... during the preseason i got into silver with the hopes of leaving bronze in my wake but will it help me at all or am i still bleeped come the 21st when i do my promo's?

replies.body: Yeah, that's what I thought. A little frusterating that i spent all the time getting from b4 to silver 5 and rito gives me no credit.

From my understanding of the system, when it comes to the season reset, your MMR will stay approximately the same as where it currently is. So if your MMR is equal to that of Silver 5, and then you win most of your provisional matches, you will most likely be put in Silver 5 for the start of Season 5.
I hope this helped :)

If you ended the season in Bronze 4 then yes you will most likely be Bronze again come next season. The small MMR reset that happens should help you since if you are below Silver the reset actually makes your MMR go up slightly.
Don't worry, if you got out of bronze once, you will easily climb if you go back to bronze next season.
probs depends how well you do with your 2015 promo games
